TopicTitle: [1.1.3] Contract Pack: Historic Missions [V2.3.0] 23/07/2016 - Display Updates and Mars exploration!

Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Fryloespi said:
> 
> 
> Hi guys. I have been working on a replacement version for this mod for the <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> series for several months. It started as an expansion pack for this mod but became a full re-write after Whitecat quit modding. It aims to completely re-write and majorly expand this entire mod from beginning to end. First for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> and then for stock. The beta of 622 contracts is available for testing over in this thread [\[Wip\] History of Spaceflight - Contract Pack for <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/<abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/RP-0](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/173683-wip-history-of-spaceflight-contract-pack-for-rorp-0/)
> 

If <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">rss</abbr> we're updated to 1.4.2, I'd just on this immediately! Sadly since it's now, I shall have to wait for the stock version to release someday

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, DracoSilverpath said:
> 
> 
> If <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">rss</abbr> we're updated to 1.4.2, I'd just on this immediately! Sadly since it's now, I shall have to wait for the stock version to release someday
> 

I could probably have a stock beta released of most of my 622 contracts for 1.4.2. I will probably drop some of the earlier <abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr>/RP-0 contracts for sounding rockets I made. Will probably start a little bit before Sputnik-1 for stock. Should be released for stock within a few weeks without major testing if people are interested.  And then develop both versions concurrently. I have more than enough free time now and in the foreseeable future to work on both.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-04-13T17:57:10Z" title="04/13/2018 05:57  PM" data-short="6 yr">April 13, 2018</time> by Fryloespi**

Should be released for stock within a few weeks without major testing if people are interested.  And then develop both versions concurrently. I shall eagerly await the stock version to test ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") I personally would love sounding g rocket contracts also, as I already use several mods and contract packs for just that, but I can understand if you did not want to include them since stock ksp isn't the best suited to them sadly.

> 
> 
> On ‎3‎/‎21‎/‎2018 at 11:18 AM, Crewlink said:
> 
> 
> Im going to revive this Mod. If u have any ideas for improvements, just let me know.
> 

If you could split the contracts into nation specific packs, that would be great. Like a 'U.S. Pack', or a 'Soviet Pack'.

> 
> 
> On 4/13/2018 at 1:17 PM, DracoSilverpath said:
> 
> 
> I shall eagerly await the stock version to test ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") I personally would love sounding g rocket contracts also, as I already use several mods and contract packs for just that, but I can understand if you did not want to include them since stock ksp isn't the best suited to them sadly.
> 

Well it went faster than expected and I just have the Soviet missions left to convert so expect it sometime tonight or tomorrow. I  dropped a portion of sounding rockets but left in the development of larger and larger ballistic missiles. 17 pre-Sputnik missions remain after the conversion.

>

> 
> 
> Well it went faster than expected and I just have the Soviet missions left to convert so expect it sometime tonight or tomorrow. I  dropped a portion of sounding rockets but left in the development of larger and larger ballistic missiles. 17 pre-Sputnik missions remain after the conversion.
> 

Awesome! Sadly i work and my freetime is limited, but will give it a go as soon as I'm able!

The beta for stock is now released on the github. 580 contracts from 1942-1967.

So you're not "continuing" the mod, you're re-building it.  

Okay then.
I know this is old, but is there a way to select only the Shuttle missions from this pack ?
